channel.title: [REQUEST] Youtube Icon, clan logo, clan banner
channel.description:
Hi there,
If you don't know me already my name is Jarod and I make website. I am here requesting a youtube icon for [b]my clan's youtube[/b] account ([url=http://www.youtube.com/user/TheBloodsTV]click here[/url]), my [b]clans logo[/b] ([url=http://s3.invisionfree.com/The_Bloods/]click here for site[/url]), and [b]my clans banner[/b]; that will be used to advertise my clan.
First I want a banner- 485 wide & 100 high - for my clan website; forum. The title is The Bloods and the slogan will be "Join the gang, join the game to join The Bloods!". I want it to look excitingly dangerous though, so if your good with effect do it :). If you need a picture you can use this one:
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2gtrync.png[/img][/center]
Second I want a image - 120 wide & 90 high -for my clan's youtube channel. All you need is the background to be black and the The Bloods TV, here is am example of how I want it:
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/fwhxmp.png[/img][/center]
Last I need a clan logo, the title of it will be "The Bloods" and the slogan will be "Bringing the gang into the game." And if you can, please make the logo initially something like this:
[center][table] [tr] [td][size=75pt][b]TB[/b] [/size][/td] [td]
[size=30pt][b]The Bloods[/b][/size] [size=15pt]Bringing the gang into the game[/size] [/td] [/tr] [/table][/center]
Make all these with cool fonts, I donno which one would look the best but if you make one with each of these that would be really great!
Ancient font like - http://www.dafont.com/raslani-ancient-script.font Broken/Old thing - http://www.dafont.com/farcry.font [I'm pretty sure I want this for my clans YT image] Maybe this for the banner - http://www.dafont.com/hotel-coral-essex.font OMFG get this for clan logo! - http://www.dafont.com/blood-omen.font
[center][size=20pt][b]Thank you so much for making these![/b][/size][/center]

item.title: [REQUEST] Youtube Icon, clan logo, clan banner
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

no, realdy, your too kind ^^

item.title: [REQUEST] Youtube Icon, clan logo, clan banner
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

Hi there,

If you don’t know me already my name is Jarod and I make website. I am here requesting a youtube icon for my clan’s youtube account (click here), my clans logo (click here for site), and my clans banner; that will be used to advertise my clan.

First
I want a banner- 485 wide & 100 high - for my clan website; forum. The title is The Bloods and the slogan will be “Join the gang, join the game to join The Bloods!”. I want it to look excitingly dangerous though, so if your good with effect do it :). If you need a picture you can use this one:

[center][/center]

Second
I want a image - 120 wide & 90 high -for my clan’s youtube channel. All you need is the background to be black and the The Bloods TV, here is am example of how I want it:

[center][/center]

Last
I need a clan logo, the title of it will be “The Bloods” and the slogan will be “Bringing the gang into the game.” And if you can, please make the logo initially something like this:

[center][table]
[tr]
[td][size=75pt]TB [/size][/td]
[td]

[size=30pt]The Bloods[/size]
[size=15pt]Bringing the gang into the game[/size]
[/td]
[/tr]
[/table][/center]

Make all these with cool fonts, I donno which one would look the best but if you make one with each of these that would be really great!

Ancient font like - http://www.dafont.com/raslani-ancient-script.font
Broken/Old thing - http://www.dafont.com/farcry.font [I’m pretty sure I want this for my clans YT image]
Maybe this for the banner - http://www.dafont.com/hotel-coral-essex.font
OMFG get this for clan logo! - http://www.dafont.com/blood-omen.font

[center][size=20pt]Thank you so much for making these![/size][/center]
